slide-1.title: How to Play
content: 48D is similar to a ball-in-cage game, resembling roulette. Simply guess the number (1-48) where the ball will land as the result.

slide-2.title: Placing Bets
content: You can place various bets, such as Odd/Even, High/Low, Split, Corner, Row, Column, and more.

slide-3.title: Result
content: The result is determined when the ball stops spinning in the cage. Bets matching the outcome will win.
